name: Tigers of the Arctic
description:
Beware of the Eagles! They are coming for your big cat family! Be part of this young Tiger's story. Help him find his own path across this vast arctic territory.

The story begins with a young Tiger and his parents. You start with a few simple tasks like playing with some family members, finding some food, and drinking some water. Be careful, this is the wild land of magic and adventure. Your Tiger will build her skill by completing various quests. Along the way, you will develop your hunting skills. You will need to drink water and stay hydrated. Be sure to hunt and eat when your hunger level gets low.

We are excited to finally bring an arctic adventure game that many of your have been asking for. Its a long form game, with customizable family members, cub training, and magical elements. Collect Gems, Treasure Chests, and Keys to unlock. This game is the third game in our arctic series.

Epic Cut Scenes 
--- This is where we separate ourselves from other animal apps. Thrilling movie quality cut scenes so you really feel part of the story.

Customize your Tiger Family
 --- The app allows you to customize you all members of your family. Coat Color, Markings, and even Call Sound.

Craft your Magic
 --- Collect the Magic Books, Find the Wizards and Nymphs, Potions, and Magic Items to Craft your magic spells

Family Members
 --- Locate your family members and use them to team up against your enemies.

Epic Final Battle 
--- The final battle is very challenging. You will need to use your magic and clan to win the battle.

Animal Enemies 
--- Enemies include Dragons, Epic Elementals, Deer, Puma, Bears, Giant Spiders, Dark Wolves, Eagles, and many more.

Epic Quest is a series of games we created at Wild Foot. We've taken all your suggestions and tried to combine them into this game. We like to think it is 3D animal simulation at its best. If you disagree, let us know.

We love hearing from all the Wildfoot game fans. Please be sure and stop by our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.   We love to know your constructive criticism. Email us your suggestions. Our focus is making creative games with animals and magic. Animal simulators with something special added. Best of luck and have a Wildfoot day!
